scripts.dev: concurrently -n server,client -c yellow,cyan "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client"
scripts.build: npm run build -w shared && npm run build -w server && npm run build -w client
scripts.test: npm run test -w server && npm run test -w client
scripts.test:mutation: npm run test:mutation -w server && npm run test:mutation -w client
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck -w shared && npm run typecheck -w server && npm run typecheck -w client
